1.title: Mark Patton Stars in Dustin Ferguson's "Amityville: Evil Never Dies"
1.plot: Dustin Ferguson, director and creator of horror flicks and owner of cult-film status Old Skool Video rental store, cast Mark Patton, lauded as the first "male scream queen," in his new feature film "Amityville: Evil Never Dies." The new film is a continuation of the "Amityville" horror series created by Ferguson and Mike Johnson. In their 2016 film "The Amityville Legacy," a cursed antique toy monkey from the original DeFeo Amityville home, creates havoc and possesses a father after being gifted during an annual family reunion. Helene Udy of "My Bloody Valentine," "...

2.title: Behind the Scenes of "The Job Interview"
2.plot: Dawna Lee Heising played Lilith in Ernest Serrano's feature film "The Job Interview" in Fresno, California. The film stars Sid Burston, Ernest Serrano and Jaime Nungaray.

1.title: Bobcat Goldthwait of GOD BLESS AMERICA
1.plot: Dawna Lee Heising interviews filmmaker Bobcat Goldthwait about his film God Bless America at Clarity Theater for MoreHorror in Hollywood.

2.title: Eric Shapiro and Richmond Riedel of the DEVOTED
2.plot: Dawna Lee Heising interviews filmmakers Richmond Riedel, Eric Shapiro and Rhoda Jordan about their upcoming film The Devoted.

3.title: Steve Oakley and Melanie Grunder of WAITING for DRACULA
3.plot: Dawna Lee Heising interviewed filmmakers Steve Oakley and Melanie Grunder of Waiting for Dracula for MoreHorror in Hollywood.

4.title: Sybil Danning at Among Friends Premiere
4.plot: Dawna Lee Heising interviewed legendary action icon Sybil Danning at the Among Friends Private Red Carpet Event and Screening for MoreHorror in Hollywood on April 17, 2012.

5.title: R.A. Mihailoff at the AMONG FRIENDS Premiere
5.plot: Dawna Lee Heising interviews R.A. Mihailoff at the Among Friends Private Red Carpet Event and Screening for MoreHorror in Hollywood on April 17, 2012.

6.title: Alyssa Lobit, Danielle Harris and Jennifer Blanc-Biehn of AMONG FRIENDS
6.plot: Dawna Lee Heising interviews Alyssa Lobit, Danielle Harris and Jennifer Blanc-Biehn at the Among Friends Red Carpet Premiere at the Jon Lovitz Theatre for MoreHorror in Hollywood on April 17, 2010.

7.title: Behind the Scenes of SCARY or DIE
7.plot: Dawna Lee Heising interviews writer, producer and director Michael Emanuel and stars Bill Oberst Jr. and Shannon Bobo of the feature film SCARY OR DIE for MoreHorror in Hollywood. SCARY OR DIE also stars Domiziano Arcangeli and will premiere in May 2012. Show filmed and edited by Renah Wolzinger and produced in association with Dismal Productions.

8.title: Scott Erikkson and Joseph Newcombe of MR. NAKAMURA's ADDICTION
8.plot: Dawna Lee Heising interviewed Scott Eriksson and Joseph Newcombe before the premiere of MR. NAKAMURA'S ADDICTION at the 2012 Newport Beach Film Festival. The film was written and directed by Scott Eriksson, produced by and stars Jake Won Lee, Joseph Newcombe and Savannah Lathern.

9.title: H.P. Mendoza of I AM a GHOST
9.plot: Dawna Lee Heising interviews the writer, director, producer and editor of I Am a Ghost, H.P. Mendoza, at the 2012 Los Angeles Asian Pacific Film Festival at the Directors Guild of America for MoreHorror in Hollywood.

10.title: Karen-Eileen Gordon on MoreHorror in Hollywood
10.plot: Dawna Lee Heising interviewed Karen-Eileen Gordon of Magic City on the Starz Network at the Director's Guild of America at the 2012 Los Angeles Asian Pacific Film Festival for MoreHorror in Hollywood.

11.title: Lord Kayson of SHADOW of the MONARCH
11.plot: Dawna Lee Heising interviews Lord Kayson of Shadow of the Monarch for MoreHorror in Hollywood. Lord Kayson plays Death Head in the action/thriller.

12.title: Director Randy Kent of the PERFECT HOUSE
12.plot: Dawna Lee Heising interviews filmmaker Randy Kent for MoreHorror in Hollywood. Kent directed the film The Perfect House.

13.title: Writer/Director Jared Masters and SLINK Stars Guest on MoreHorror in Hollywood
13.plot: Dawna Lee Heising interviewed writer and director Jared Masters and stars Carlos Ramsey Ramirez and Danika Galindo of the feature film SLINK.

14.title: Interview with Actress Vida Ghaffari
14.plot: Dawna Lee Heising interviewed actress, host, writer and comedian Vida Ghaffari for MoreHorror in Hollywood at Polymedia Studios in Orange, CA. Ghaffari is one of the stars of Mark Savage's upcoming feature film "Circus of Dread".

15.title: Interview with Ace Jordan and Kirk13 of the Comic E-zine 'Grad Night'
15.plot: Dawna Lee Heising interviews filmmaker Ace Jordan and artist Kirk13 for MoreHorror in Hollywood about their innovative web-based comic book "Grad Night", which was authored by Jordan and illustrated by Kirk13.

16.title: Photo Shoot for 2013 MoreHorror Calendar
16.plot: John Cox shoots photos of Dawna Lee Heising at Polymedia Entertainment Studios in Orange, California for the 2013 MoreHorror Calendar.

17.title: Brilliant Filmmaker Mark Savage Guests on MoreHorror in Hollywood
17.plot: Dawna Lee Heising interviews brilliant filmmaker Mark Savage about his more than twenty year career and about Savage Sinema from Down Under.

18.title: Girls & Corpses Magazine Signing at Meltdown Comics
18.plot: Dawna Lee Heising and photographer Robert X attended the Girls & Corpses Magazine signing event at Meltdown Comics on Sunset Boulevard on August 18, 2012.

19.title: Filmmaker Mark Savage Discusses Circus of Dread
19.plot: Filmmaker Mark Savage talks about his upcoming film "Circus of Dread", which stars Domiziano Arcangeli, Bill Oberst Jr. and Vida Ghaffari, and features Dawna Lee Heising, Jasi Cotton Lanier and Rich Gotteri.

20.title: Filmmaker Jared Cohn Guests on MoreHorror
20.plot: Jared Cohn is the director of "#Hold Your Breath", writer and director of "12-12-12" and will be directing "The Start-up" from Asylum Films.

21.title: Shriekfest Founder Denise Gossett on MoreHorror in Hollywood
21.plot: Dawna Lee Heising of MoreHorror in Hollywood interviews Shriekfest founder and CEO Denise Gossett at the 2012 Shriekfest Kick-off Party at B52 in Hollywood, CA.

22.title: Actress Vida Ghaffari at Shriekfest 2012
22.plot: Dawna Lee Heising interviews actress Vida Ghaffari at the Shriekfest Premiere party at B52 in Hollywood, CA for MoreHorror in Hollywood. Heising and Ghaffari will both be featured in Mark Savage's feature film "Circus of Dread".

23.title: Writer/Director Jared Masters Releases New Trailer for SLINK
23.plot: Dawna Lee Heising interviews writer/director Jared Masters, Adam Trash and Paul Tirado at Shriekfest 2012 for MoreHorror in Hollywood about the feature film SLINK from Frolic Pictures. Slink, a horror/thriller picture involving a crazed tanning salon creeper-killer, Dale (Art Roberts), and his glamorous wife, Joan (Dawna Lee Heising), whose business in manufacturing mysterious leather purses has innocent girls like Kayla (Danika Galindo), and Playboy's Jade Bryce, fighting to survive. Executive Producer Julia Faye West also stars as the strange and seductive Aunt May.

24.title: Interview with Shockfest Founder Guil Claveria at Shriekfest 2012
24.plot: Dawna Lee Heising interviews Shockfest founder Guil Claveria, Matt Rosvally and Russell Jones of Mockfest at the Shriekfest Opening Night event at B52 in Hollywood, CA for MoreHorror in Hollywood.

25.title: Interview with Filmmaker James Cullen Bressack
25.plot: Bursting upon the indie horror scene at the age of eighteen with his first feature My Pure Joy, James Cullen Bressack has been called "horror's new hope" (STUDIO CITY PATCH - Mike Szymanski) and "a talent to watch out for." (HORROR SLEAZE TRASH - Ben John Smith) as well as garnering rave reviews on almost every horror web site. Released by Media Blasters on their Fresh Meat Shriek Show label in 2012, the film quickly rose to the top of the best sellers list on Amazon.com in the horror category. His second feature, a real shocker whose details are top secret, is due to...

26.title: Gregory Blair Guests on MoreHorror in Hollywood
26.plot: Gregory Blair has been active in the arts for many years as an actor, writer, director and producer. A Geoffrey Award winning actor, Gregory has graced the stage, the big screen and the small screen. As a writer, Gregory's been represented on stage (Cold Lang Syne, The Last Banana and Nicholas Nickleby), in prose offerings such as The Ritual, Little Shivers and the Stonewall Award winning Spewing Pulp and in screenplays such as Twisted Fortune which is in development at 701 Productions, The Gateway which is filming in England with Enmar Productions and Deadly ...

27.title: MoreHorror in Hollywood Covers 2012 Shockfest Film Festival
27.plot: Dawna Lee Heising and John Cox covered the 2012 Shockfest Film Festival for MoreHorror in Hollywood in November 2012.

28.title: Steve Oakley and Melanie Grunder of Award-winning Johnny V's Reality Stars at 2012 Mockfest Film Festival
28.plot: Dawna Lee Heising of MoreHorror in Hollywood interviews Steve Oakley and Melanie Grunder of the award-winning film "Johnny V's Reality Stars" at the 2012 Mockfest Film Festival. Star of the film Johnny Venocur won the Best Actor award at the 2012 Mockfest Film Festival.

1.title: Interview with Cast of P.A.S.S.
1.plot: Alexander Wraith and Rigan Machado are the Officers of P.A.S.S. Entertainment LLC. Wraith wrote, directed and starred in P.A.S.S., which also stars Aki Aleong, Machado, Sean Christopher Stone and Bianca Bree. Dawna Lee Heising interviews the cast of P.A.S.S. for More Horror in Hollywood and also plays Aki Aleong's wife in the film.

2.title: Sergio Candido and Andre Roberson of Visions Evilutions
2.plot: Dawna Lee Heising of MoreHorror in Hollywood interviewed executive producer Andre Roberson and writer/director Sergio Candido of the feature film Visions Evilutions.

3.title: Maria Olsen Guests on MoreHorror in Hollywood
3.plot: Actress and producer Maria Olsen was interviewed by Dawna Lee Heising for MoreHorror in Hollywood. Maria is the CEO of MOnsterworks66, and came to America from South Africa in January 2005. In eight short years she has performed in 15 stage plays (including one Off-Broadway), directed three plays, written and directed her own play and first feature film, shot at least 40 feature films, 70 shorts, 10 web series, 10 music videos and recorded five voiceover gigs.

4.title: 2013 Shriekfest Opening Night Party
4.plot: Dawna Lee Heising and John Cox covered the 2013 Shriekfest Film Festival's Opening Night Party at B52 in Hollywood. The CEO and Founder of the Shriekfest Film Festival is Denise Gossett.

1.title: 'Teachers' Day' World Premiere at the 2014 Shockfest/Mockfest Film Festivals
1.plot: Jared Masters' feature film "Teachers' Day" had its World Premiere at the 2014 Shockfest and Mockfest Film Festivals at Raleigh Studios in Hollywood on January 9, 2014. Shockfest and Mockfest were founded by CEO Guil Claveria. Dawna Lee Heising covered the World Premiere for MoreHorror in Hollywood, and won the 2014 Mockfest Film Festival Award for Best Actress for "Teachers' Day". Jared Masters was nominated for "Best Editor" and "Teachers' Day" was nominated for the Zelig Award, the highest honor from Mockfest.

2.title: MoreHorror Covers the 2014 RIP Horror Film Festival
2.plot: Dawna Lee Heising interviewed Lifetime Achievement Winner Sid Haig for MoreHorror in Hollywood at the 2014 RIP Horror Film Festival, founded by LJ Rivera.

3.title: Cast and Crew of Natural Born Filmmaker
3.plot: Dawna Lee Heising interviewed the cast and crew of Steve Oakley and Melanie Grunder's upcoming feature film "Natural Born Filmmaker" for Seth Metoyer and MoreHorror in Hollywood.

4.title: Zombie Massacre Film-within-a-Film
4.plot: Dawna Lee Heising and Stan Goodrich conducted interviews for MoreHorror in Hollywood on the set of "Natural Born Filmmaker" during the filming of the film-within-a-film "Zombie Massacre". Show filmed and edited by John Cox.

5.title: First Annual 2014 Galactic Film Festival
5.plot: The first annual Galactic Film Festival was held at the Frida Theatre in Santa Ana, CA on August 9-10, 2014. The executive director of the festival is L.J. Rivera. Dawna Lee Heising was crowned Miss Galactic Film Festival at the Awards Ceremony. "Punkettes" from Frolic Pictures had it's World Premiere at the festival and won "Festival Favorite".

6.title: Mike and JoAnn Thomas of the FANtastic Horror Film Festival
6.plot: Dawna Lee Heising and FANtastic Horror Film Festival co-founders Mike and JoAnn Thomas announced the movies that are Official Selections of the three-day Horror Film Festival that will be held in the Gaslamp Quarter of San Diego from October 31 through November 2, 2014, as part of the city's Gaslamp Halloween Celebration. The FANtastic Horror Film Festival provides an outlet for independent horror films with a focus on movie viewers and the filmmakers.

7.title: 2014 Shriekfest Opening Night Party
7.plot: The 2014 Shriekfest Film Festival Opening Night Party was held at Bar Sinister on October 2, 2014. Denise Gossett is the CEO and Founder of the Shriekfest Film Festival, one of the largest horror film festivals in the world.

1.title: Interviews with Cast of "Murder at Thick City"
1.plot: The hilarious, over-the-top, comedic murder mystery play "Murder At Thick City, written by screenwriter/director, Gary Hardwick (Deliver Us From Eva, The Brothers) and directed by actress/producer, Nina Womack (The Power of Love, Melrose Place, Pacific Palisades) takes place present day at a fictitious strip club called "Thick City." Dawna Lee Heising interviews the cast.

2.title: 2015 Galactic and RIP Film Festivals Summer Mixer
2.plot: More Horror in Hollywood Hostess Dawna Lee Heising interviewed award-winning filmmaker Jared Masters and actor Anthony Usewicz about the upcoming film "Blood Tulip" and actress Vida Ghaffari about the upcoming horror comedy "Garden Party Massacre" at the Summer Mixer for L.J. Rivera's 2015 Galactic Film Festival and RIP Horror Film Festival. Dawna is Miss Galactic Film Festival.

3.title: Stars of "The Devil Dogs of Kilo Company Officers Club"
3.plot: "The Devil Dogs of Kilo Company Officers Club" is a brilliantly conceived, animated WWII epic, written and directed by Bobby Easley for a 2015 release. The assistant director is Terence Muncy and the engineer is Tom Roosa. Bobby Easley is a director and actor, known for The Boogeyman; The River Runs Black; Scream Machine; All Sinners Night; and X. He is the CEO of Horror Wasteland Pictures International. The plot of the innovative feature film is: "A company of Marines deep behind enemy lines on a top secret mission are outmanned and outgunned as they fight their way ...

4.title: Joe Williamson and Joycelyne Lew of Samurai Cop 2: Deadly Vengeance
4.plot: Dawna Lee Heising interviews Associate Producer Joe Williamson and actress Joycelyne Lew about the premiere of Samurai Cop 2: Deadly Vengeance at the Laemmle NoHo7 on October 9, 2015. Samurai Cop 2: Deadly Vengeance is the long-awaited sequel to the cult classic and is directed by Gregory Hatanaka. It's 25 years later, and Detective Frank Washington (Mark Frazer) is forced to team up with his long estranged partner Joe Marshall (Mathew Karedas) to solve a series of assassinations. In addition to taking on their resurrected nemesis Fuj Fujiyama (Cranston Komuro), the ...

5.title: Samurai Cop 2: Deadly Vengeance at the Martial Arts Museum
5.plot: Samurai Cop 2: Deadly Vengeance is the much anticipated sequel to the legendary cult classic, Samurai Cop (1991). Samurai Cop 2: Deadly Vengeance is directed by Gregory Hatanaka and explores the dynamic duo of Detective Frank Washington (Mark Frazier) and Joe Marshall (Mathew Karedas), who are teaming up once again in this action-packed tour de force. This time their mission is to solve a series of assassinations being committed by a secret group of sexy female vigilante killers. The stars of the film descended upon the Martial Arts Museum for a very special event on ...

6.title: Domiziano Arcangeli Releases "Orgy of the Damned"
6.plot: The executive producer, writer and leading man of Orgy of the Damned, cult star Domiziano Arcangeli, wanted the film to be not only a suspenseful, gory and erotic vampire movie, but also a more profound attempt at analyzing a certain society of decadence, portraying rebels without a cause in a world of dangerous liaisons gone terribly awry, while also featuring more unique film styles from that sublime top notch school of retro avant-garde. Orgy of the Damned is tentatively set to open in the U.S. on Halloween 2015.

7.title: More Horror at the 2015 RIP Horror Film Festival
7.plot: Dawna Lee Heising of More Horror in Hollywood covered the 2015 RIP Horror Film Festival, where Damien Dante's "Jezebeth 2: Hour of the Gun" won Best Soundtrack.

8.title: More Horror Covers Ted V. Mikels' "Ten Violent Women: Part Two"
8.plot: Dawna Lee Heising conducted an interview for More Horror with legendary filmmaker Ted V. Mikels and lead actress Donna Hamblin about the upcoming feature film "Ten Violent Women: Part Two" at Mikels' home in Las Vegas, NV. The sequel to Mikels' highly successful "Ten Violent Women" is focused on strong female characters deep into exercise and physical development. Shot by Johnny Cornett and edited by John Cox.

1.title: Ron Becks Is Hunter
1.plot: Hunter, the urban action thriller directed and produced by award-winning filmmaker Gregory Hatanaka, is now available on demand at Amazon, Google, iTunes and Cable. Noted actor Ron Becks is the writer-producer and star of Hunter where he plays the title role of Lt. Ramsey Hunter.

2.title: Grim Weaver Will Premiere at Laemmle NoHo7 in October 2016
2.plot: Ernest Serrano's "Grim Weaver" will be featured at the historic NOHO7 Laemmle Theater in North Hollywood from October 28 through October 31, 2016. "Grim Weaver" stars Sid Burston (Exit Strategy, Get Thee Behind Thee), Art Roberts (Interstellar Wars, Slink), Roxanne Dover (The Shield, Miles Away), Malika Perkins Blessing (The Perfect Man), Belinda Fruge (Unspeakable Indiscretions), among many other talented actors. The film features Dawna Lee Heising of More Horror in Hollywood as Debbie Cory.

3.title: Dustin Ferguson's "Meathook Massacre II"
3.plot: Dustin Ferguson has directed 28 feature films and over 60 music videos to date. . In 2016 Ferguson returns with "Meathook Massacre II". Taking place 10 years after the events in the original film, we follow Dan as he tries to uncover what really happened to his twin Sister Dani a decade ago. A rash of new killings leads him to an underground cavern where he not only meets the Meathook Killer face-to-face, but also his entire sadistic family as well! Genre stars Deborah Dutch and Dawna Lee Heising appear in roles as well as Nebraska Senator Colby Coash and local Scream...

4.title: Michael S. Rodriguez and Tino Zamora of Lake of Shadows: Legend of Avocado Lake
4.plot: Dawna Lee Heising interviews director Michael S. Rodriguez and executive producer Tino Zamora of Lake of Shadows: The Legend of Avocado Lake for More Horror in Hollywood. The film follows a group of young aspiring film makers as they set out to uncover the truth about a local urban legend at a mysterious lake resort. Lake of Shadows will combine the sub genre of found footage and traditional horror as the team seeks out a legend of a large man eating fish that lives in the lake. This documentary horror film combines urban legend with fact and incorporates the sub ...

5.title: Filmmaker Mark Savage Announces New Horror Feature "Purgatory Road"
5.plot: Delirium, the production company whose maiden outing was the 2016 Bill Oberst Jr.-Armand Assante hit thriller STRESSED TO KILL, has just announced it will go into production on PURGATORY ROAD in November 2016 for delivery mid-2017. Directed by Mark Savage, scripted by Savage and Tom Parnell, and produced by Chris Smernes, the team behind STRESSED TO KILL, the film has been described as hardcore horror with a bloody helping of twisted "faith".

imdb.plot outline: Dawna Lee Heising and Seth Metoyer are the Executive Producers of "MoreHorror in Hollywood". Dawna is a working actress and member of SAG-AFTRA and is the More Horror in Hollywood host. Seth is the Founder and President of the premier horror film review site MoreHorror.com. "MoreHorror in Hollywood" is broadcast on Jerry Moore's Prime TV channel and covers horror film festivals, premieres and events. Dawna conducts interviews with successful filmmakers, producers and actors in the horror genre.
imdb.title: MoreHorror in Hollywood
plot: Dawna Lee Heising and Seth Metoyer are the Executive Producers of "_MoreHorror in Hollywood_ (qv)". Dawna is a working actress and member of SAG-AFTRA and is the More Horror in Hollywood host. Seth is the Founder and President of the premier horror film review site MoreHorror.com. "_MoreHorror in Hollywood_ (qv)" is broadcast on Jerry Moore's Prime TV channel and covers horror film festivals, premieres and events. Dawna conducts interviews with successful filmmakers, producers and actors in the horror genre.::Eye on Excellence PR
